paper_metadata.title: Impact of urban productive safety net program on asset accumulation and consumption rate in Dessie city

component_a_cash_support.cash_evidence_citation: The program combines two main components: direct support through cash and/or food transfers to eligible households, and support for public works programs. The cash and food transfers are intended to meet immediate consumption needs

study_characteristics.outcomes_evidence_citation: Based on the econometric estimation results... The impact of program participation was also found to be positive and significant for both home asset and community asset. While food and non-food consumption even the total consumption and food security status are also positive.
study_characteristics.design_evidence_citation: A total of 112 households were selected randomly among the public work Urban Productive Safety Net Program beneficiary and non-beneficiary households.

evidence_citations.program_name_citation: Urban Productive Safety Net Program is designed to support the poor households and establish urban safety net mechanisms.
evidence_citations.country_citation: The Productive Safety Net Program (PSNP) is a large-scale social protection program implemented in Ethiopia since 2005.
evidence_citations.target_population_citation: Urban Productive Safety Net Program is designed to support the poor households
